You asked for a rating so I'm giving you one. The app is pretty bad. The desktop application is pretty good now, but the app is so bad. If you have a large library (>10,000 songs) and try to just press play and shuffle your library, it regularly takes around 5 minutes until the first song starts playing. Then when I try to skip a song, it doesn't play the next song but just sits there showing blank album art for a minute (still playing the last song) then gives up and just shows the song that was already playing. I'll try again and wait for like 60 seconds before it decides to move to the next song. It's not hard to make an app shuffle a lot of songs. Please make this basic functionality work. Spotify is also horrible at playing podcasts, regularly glitching out past a certain length, and forgetting my play position. I gave up and use a separate app for podcasts (which is way better), but spotify now CONSTANTLY tries to force podcasts in my face and "recommend" stupid podcasts, which in reality is just shoving ads in my face, for things I don't want, despite me paying for premium, and hundreds of people giving you guys feedback that we want all podcasts hidden or removed automatically (not by manually going into a "music" tab). You're even trying to turn yourself into tiktok/youtube and now forcing AUTOPLAYING VIDEO podcasts on my home page when I open the app. I DON'T WANT THIS VIDEO GARBAGE IN MY MUSIC APP I PAY FOR. GET RID OF IT. You don't even give us a setting to hide podcasts, to hide videos, or even to disable autoplay of videos (and the "workaround" of enabling the "low bandwidth" mode in settings IS NOT A SOLUTION TO THIS). And when I complain to your "customer support", it's just an AI chatbot telling me I can disable this and making up a setting that doesn't exist, because that's what LLMs do. They're not actual support. They just make up nonsense then say sorry goodbye. Please listen to your customers (and your paying customers) and stop making stupid decisions and forcing stupid stuff on us. I still like you as a service in general and despise apple, I just want you to do better and want to actually enjoy music on my phone effortlessly without all these stupid issues.
